index.welcomeSubtext: Your boards are ready and waiting for you.
index.editSortWarning: Warning: there is at least one board which does not have a valid last edited date. This is probably a remainder from a board created in an old version of Kanri. Please edit all boards at least once to mitigate this behaviour.
index.createBoardPrompt: Create a board to get started with tracking your tasks better.
index.importDataPrompt: You can import data from other sources using the import/export menu:
index.getUpdatesHeading: Want to get the latest updates and chat with the creator?
index.deleteActionConfirmationText: Are you sure you want to delete the board {boardName}? This action is irreversible.

settings.settingsHeadingSubtext: Change the behaviour of the application here.
settings.customThemeEditorHeading: Select the colors for your custom theme:
settings.customThemeImportHeadingSubtext: Note: imports override your current theme so export any custom theme which you don't want to lose in advance!
settings.colorResetText: If the colors do not update, please click
settings.preferencesSubtext: Change the behaviour of your Kanban boards.
settings.preferencesZoomSubtext: Adjust the global zoom level for your boards.
settings.preferencesAddToTopButtonSubtext: Displays a button which allows you to add new cards to the top of a column.
settings.preferencesDisplayNumberOfCardsHeading: Display number of cards in column
settings.preferencesDisplayNumberOfCardsSubtext: Shows how many cards are in each column.
settings.languageSelectorSubtext: Change the language of the application.
settings.miscellaneousAnimationsSubtext: Disable this option to remove all animations in the app.
settings.miscellaneousDeleteAllDataSubtext: This will irreversibly delete all of your data!
settings.exportThemeDialogTitle: Select file to export data to
settings.loadJsonErrorMessage: Could not load JSON file! Please check if the file is proper JSON.
settings.parseJsonErrorMessage: Could not load JSON file! Please check if the file is formatted correctly and is not from an old version of Kanri.

import.importExportSubtext: Manage your data by exporting and importing it from and to Kanri.
import.importTabSubtext: Import full data or individual boards from Kanri, KanbanElectron or Trello®
import.importTabPartialSubtext: One file equals one board to import. Note: you can select multiple files/boards to import at once.
import.importTabFullSubtext: Imports complete data from one file. WARNING: This overrides all of your data with what you import! You may want to export your data first.
import.exportTabPartialSubtext: A partial export means that you receive one .json file for one individual board.
import.exportTabFullSubtext: Exports all of your data (boards, themes, other preferences like zoom) into one .json file.
import.exportFullJsonDialogTitle: Select file to export data to
import.exportPartialJsonDialogTitle: Select file to export board to
import.importErrorBadJson: Could not load JSON file! Please check if the file is correct.
import.importErrorGoodJsonFaultyData: Could not load JSON file! Please check the file is formatted correctly and not from an old version of Kanri.
import.importErrorNoBoards: Cannot load files with no boards. Please import a file with at least one board.
import.importErrorTrello: Could not load JSON file! Please check the file is formatted correctly.
import.importErrorTrelloConversion: Could not convert your Trello board. Please try again and report this bug to the developer if it happens again.
import.importErrorKanbanElectron: Could not load JSON file! Please check the file is formatted correctly and exported from the lastest version of KanbanElectron.
import.importErrorGithub: The file {file} is not a valid board exported from GitHub projects. If you believe this is a bug, please open a GitHub issue or email {email}
import.importDuplicateBoard: The board {boardName} already exists (board with the same ID). Do you want to import as a duplicate?
